views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 10 and till 12.4 (Including arm64e/A12 Devices).

CleanSpotFooters is a Tiny Tweak that Allows to Make Clean and Neat the Footers Items and the Edit Button from the Spotlight Widgets View on LockScreen and HomeScreen!

The Tweak Provides:

- Hide (without Disabling) the Edit Widgets Button. You can tap to open the Widgets Selection where the Button normally Sits.

- Hide the New Widgets Button Labels.

- Get Rid of the Footers Items from the Spotlight Widgets.

The Tweak is now out from the Beta Stage of My Repository also Bringing arm64e/A12 Devices Support.

If you Have got My Repo Version, Just Uninstall it and Install this New One.

No options to Configure.

See Screenshots below.

Feel free to contact me via Mail or via Twitter @CydiaGeek, enjoy it, thanks! :)

would be greatly appreciated!
